description:
Hearing that Nobunaga was heading to Kyoto with 30,000 men, the Azai and Asakura forces seek sanctuary in Mt. Hiei. Nobunaga meets with a monk from Enryaku-ji, which is located on Mt. Hiei, asking them to side with him, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: There Are No Sanctuaries in These Troubled Times
